attributes.action: Provide free LFTs to those living with vulnerable relatives
attributes.additional_details: To save lives, and allow the families to continue working/living without the fear of giving covid to their vulnerable loved ones
attributes.background: We want the government to provide free lateral flow tests to families living with vulnerable relatives/people who are immunocompromised. To allow them to continue to go to work/school knowing they aren’t bringing covid home / harming their relatives.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609233
